duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead all maintenance functions and personnel, and maintain and repair manufacturing equipment, facilities, and infrastructure.
Support new equipment installation and process improvements.
Design, coordinate, implement, and maintain projects and improvements for the site to improve safety, productivity, quality, and cost.
Develop and maintain preventive maintenance program for production equipment to improve equipment reliability.
Manage inventory of spare parts to support maintenance needs of equipment and facilities.
Inspect buildings and grounds, and coordinate necessary corrections and upgrades.
Manage projects for new equipment identification and installation.
Work directly with Operations, Engineering, and Quality Teams supporting site’s daily and long-term initiatives.
Manage contractors and vendors supporting site’s equipment, facilities, and infrastructure needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Technical/Engineering or Relevant Areas of Study; Required.
3+ years or Process Improvement & Maintenance experience within manufacturing environment; Required.
